summary: A test suite that validates the Databricks integration within the litellm library, covering chat/completion and embedding calls, both synchronous and asynchronous HTTP handling, streaming responses, fallback to the Databricks SDK when credentials are absent, and proper error handling.
business_intent: To guarantee reliable operation of Databricks-powered language model features in applications using litellm, ensuring correct request handling, streaming support, credential fallback, and appropriate error reporting.
